description: This file defines the root layout component for a Remix.run application, including link insertion for fonts and global HTML structure, and the main app component which renders nested routes.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Provides an array of link objects for preconnecting and loading external fonts.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that defines the HTML structure of the page, injecting head meta tags, styles, and rendering children.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component that renders the Outlet for nested routes.
